description: [SysUpdate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0663) can copy a script to the user owned `/usr/lib/systemd/system/` directory with a symlink mapped to a `root` owned directory, `/etc/ystem/system`, in the unit configuration file's `ExecStart` directive to establish persistence and elevate privileges.(Citation: Lunghi Iron Tiger Linux)

external_references.description: Daniel Lunghi. (2023, March 1). Iron Tigerâ€™s SysUpdate Reappears, Adds Linux Targeting. Retrieved March 20, 2023.
